channel.title: Questions
channel.description:
Okay I have a few questions...
1. What is ddos & how do I defend against it?
2. Will deleteing junk code reduce lag on my server?
3. How do I remove all lag on my server?
4. My server was on an auto restarter and got knocked down sometime during the night, so what could have done this (please tell me anything tht could of done this and how I can fix/defend against it)?

item.title: Questions
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

there isnt total defence…
ddos is like an virus
and the protection is like an scanner
the ddos can always update but the scanner will take time figuring out how to block it while ddos updates more and grows more compilcated

Read full topic

item.title: Questions
item.dc:creator: @frozon566 frozon566
item.description:
@frozon566 wrote:

Is there any like firewalls or anything I can use or is total defense against ddos like something that hasnt been done yet in rsps?

Read full topic

item.title: Questions
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

ddos is when an 9 year old is pissed off bout not getting admin on your server and then threatens to crash it

you can try graham’s removing thread per client

Read full topic

item.title: Questions
item.dc:creator: @frozon566 frozon566
item.description:
@frozon566 wrote:

idk I didnt take it down and yet I checked it this morning and it was at like 88% uptime so someone had to like “knock it down” lol.

item.title: Questions
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

[quote=“frozon566, post:1, topic:360347”]Okay I have a few questions…

  1. What is ddos & how do I defend against it?

  2. Will deleteing junk code reduce lag on my server?

  3. How do I remove all lag on my server?

  4. My server was on an auto restarter and got knocked down sometime during the night, so what could have done this (please tell me anything tht could of done this and how I can fix/defend against it)?[/quote]

  5. DDoS is Denial of Service.

  6. It can.

  7. Get a good stable source,run off a VPS.

  8. What do you mean “knocked down”?

Read full topic
